entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
